login_google_s.message:
Connect your Google account and get early access to features like -
  • Sync notes, To-Dos and analytics across devices.
  • Email from the new tab itself.
  • Calender integration.
  • Completely secure

Skip

login_spext.message: We're working on a new kind of Notepad.

login_spext_s.message:
It automatically converts speech (any audio or video) to text. So we're calling it Spext.
  • Perfect for lectures, speeches or interviews
  • Highlight and find important things inside the audio/video
  • Will soon sync with Limitless Notepad

Why are we working on this?
